def_cn: 不感兴趣的;不关心的;冷淡的
def_en: If you accuse someone of being indifferent to something, you mean that they have a complete lack of interest in it.

def_cn: (水平或质量)一般的,平庸的，差的
def_en: If you describe something or someone as indifferent, you mean that their standard or quality is not very good, and often quite bad.
